documents.document: Drinks tonight with some of the girls though! 🍸😀👭
Hay-fever is a killer.. Sneeze galore! 😑😷🍃🌾
Need a break! Venice needs to hurry up!! 🇮🇹😊🙏🌞
Not asleep yet and it's starting to get light outside 😳😳😳
Week nights can be so boring sometimes 😴😴
After what happened last night..genuinely believe that there is always someone up there looking after us! ⭐️⭐️
@beccadickson19 try get a sleep xx
@beccadickson19 why?
Think my mother is up there looking after us! My granny is a wee trooper after everything she's been through! ⭐️❤️
Had the hiccups for close to an hour now at work, can't get rid of them! Not ideal 😂😂😂
@darrenlindsay96 snap! A nice break is just what I need! Gonna get my tan on too! 😂 x
@greglouden1 another for you 😂😂 https://t.co/mgIdT7wQMN
@darrenlindsay96 woooo! Can't wait xx
@greglouden1 swap pugs for Pomeranians 😂😂❤️ https://t.co/ndANjOhzWK
Shite saturday nights.. Hate working weekends! 😠😴
Nap time ☺️😴💤
@ekkkkkk_x if you're an emotional wreck put you hands up 🙋🙋 #metoobabes 😳😂
@GillFlynn1 just people being immature babe and annoying me hahah xxx
Some people know exactly what buttons to push! 😡😡😡
So so bored! 😴
@hayleybarr1 omg im the same! Half the time it's just a bloody fly! 😂😂
Just want to be sitting out in the sun with a cider! Shame I start work for nightshift soon! 😫😫
Just want long hair again 😫😫😫
Best feeling ever getting into bed after nightshift! 😊
Roll on July! Holiday time! 😴☀️✈️😊
Come on murray!! 🙏🎾👟
So hard to try and give your hair a break from extensions when you see lots of people getting there's done! WHY 😩😩😩
@beccadickson19 is she at ours? I miss her!!
Cruel scary world we live in! 😳😖
Fantastic! Woke up with a stye! Would be this week when I have a lot on at the weekend! Gonna look like shriek 😠😥
hello jetlag 😞😴😴
urine infections are theee worst! 😖😖😖
can't wait for gigis tonight 🍝🍸💕
need a shopping friend for tomorrow. hate going on my own! 🛍😂
officially old.. just pulled out my 1st grey hair 😭😭😭
RT @Callux: retweet this and in 3 years I'll send one of you £1000
@MACcosmetics is it true the @jamie_genevieve lipstick isn't going to be restocked?!
roll on pay day tomorrow 😊😊
Georgia needs to leave now!! doing my head in!
@rachellouden31 me and Greg are making pancakes 2night also. 🥞😛
forgot how good toasties were! 😛
so skint and still two weeks till payday 😥😥
@rachellouden31 same! a lodge with a nice hot tub! it is our birthdays in August 😂 X
@hayleyh18 ive text you! xx
could nandos..
heartburn is the worst 😐😐😐
Thatll be my back well and truly gone 😢😢😐😐
Thank god its friday! Roll on finishing time 💃💃🎉🎉 https://t.co/7zmAXuJUDx
Cant believe greg is dragging me to see star wars tonight! Tango iceblast and popcorn will get me through! 😑🤣👫 @greglouden1
@hayleyh18 @KirstymcewanX Cant wait! Lets hope we dont peak to early 😂😂🎄🥂
Choked with the cold is not what im after 😑🤒
Gutted 😭😭🐎🐎
@hayleyh18 Cant wait! Get our dancing shoes on 💃🥂😘

Lift uptown for 5 would be grand! Hate buses 😂😂

Looking forward to a spa day on Friday morning! 😊😊
@hayleybarr1 do this all the time!! 😂😂
Just want chinese food! Shame im stuck at work 😫
Worst I've felt doing a nightshift! Bed time though #spewy 😐😊

@rachellouden31 must run in the family! Your brothers been dreaming about them 😂😂🐜 xx
RT @RobynPaterson_: My body clock is screwed 😅

Just want my long hair back ASAP! Miss it 😭
